Wave number

Definitive age variable collapsed at 90 plus. Priority: Diag, Dhage

Activities during last month: paid work
Activities during last month: self-employment
Activities during last month: voluntary work

Activities during last month: attended a formal educational or training course
Were you not in paid work during the last month due to any of these reasons?
coding: 0 = Not looking for work; 1 = Looking for, waiting for, or temporarly away from work

label: Main reason for being away from work last month
Best description of current situation
coding: 0 = Fully retired; 1 = Semi-retired; 2 = Employed; 3 = Self-employed, 4 = Unemployed; 5 = Permanently sick or disabled; 6 = Looking after family

label: How often do you do any voluntary work?
coding: 0 = Never; 1 = Less than once a year; 2 = One or twice a year; 3 = Every few months; 4 = Once a month; 5 = Twice a month or more

label: Have you ever done any paid work?
What was your main reason for leaving your previous job?
coding: 0 = Not illness or disability; 1 = Illness or disability

label: Are you paid a salary/wage in your main job?
Have you done any regular paid work in last 12 months?
Weeks in employment or self-employment in last 12 months (inc. partial weeks)
How much did gross income from work amount to in the last year
Reasons for stopping work: own ill health or disability
Are you currently looking for a new job?
Is there a compulsory retirement age at your current job?
What is the compulsory retirement age?
Would you like to work beyond the compulsory retirement age if employer let you?
You said earlier that you were (semi-)retired, at what age did you retire?
Been offered anyearly retirement incentives since age 50 which you didnt take?
How old were you?
Did you take early retirement?
When you first retired, did you retire on a full pension?
coding: 0 = No pension; 1 = Reduced pension; 2 = Full pension

label: Reasons for taking early retirement: own ill health
Reasons for retiring: own ill health
Did you have the opportunity to work past retirement age?
Did respondent or spouse do any work for pay in the last year
Gross earnings received by respondent (and spouse) in the last year
How is respondent (and partner) getting along financially these days
coding: 0 = Manage very well; 1 = Manage quite well; 2 = Get by alright; 3 = Don't manage well; 4 = Some financial difficulties; 5 = Severe financial difficulties

label: Expectation (%) that that they will be working after [age] [depends on age/sex]
Expectation (%) that their health will limit their ability to work before age 65
Expectation (%) that they will not have enough financial resources to meet needs
Country of birth recoded into UK and non-UK
(D) Highest Educational Qualification at ELSA Wave #
coding: 0 = No qualification; 1 = Foreign qualification; 2 = NVQ1; 3 = NVQ2; 4 = NVQ3; 5 = Higher education below degree; 6 = NVQ4 or NVQ5

label: Equivalizes total income
